entityneeds.animal_environment_ltt:
Environment Need
This represents how comfortable the animal is in its current exhibit. Animals and guests both benefit when an exhibit represents the animal's biome.
entityneeds.animal_hunger_ltt:
Hunger Need
This represents how hungry the animal is. All animals require food and drink in order to survive.
entityneeds.animal_thirst_ltt:
Thirst Need
This represents how thirsty the animal is. All animals should have 24-hour access to fresh water.
entityneeds.animal_rest_ltt:
Rest Need
This represents the current rest level of the animal. Tired animals will sleep anyplace they can to recuperate.
entityneeds.animal_hygiene_ltt:
Hygiene Need
This represents the current hygiene level of the animal. Dirty animals are more likely to get sick. Animals will often groom themselves.
entityneeds.animal_exercise_ltt:
Exercise Need
The current exercise level of the animal. Animals can exercise by moving around, interacting with other animals and using enrichment objects.
entityneeds.animal_shelter_ltt:
Shelter
Player should never see this.
entityneeds.animal_privacy_ltt:
Privacy Need
This represents the animal's current privacy level. Animals can use shelters or lie in grass or shade to regain their privacy as more guests view them.
entityneeds.animal_reproduction_ltt:
Reproduction
Player should never see this.
entityneeds.animal_social_ltt:
Social Need
This represents the current social level of the animal. Some animals are more social with other animals than others.
entityneeds.animal_stimulation_ltt:
Stimulation Need
This represents the current stimulation level of the animal. Animals can meet this need by interacting with different enrichment objects.
entityneeds.animal_happy_ltt:
Happiness:
Animal is happy and content.
entityneeds.animal_not_happy_ltt:
Happiness:
Animal is not happy. Guests don't like to see unhappy animals.
entityneeds.animal_sick_ltt:
Health:
Animal is sick. If the animal is not treated soon it may die. Keepers can heal sick animals.
entityneeds.animal_pregnant_ltt:
Pregnant:
Animal is pregnant. When the icon turns red, the animal will give birth.
entityneeds.guest_happy_ltt:
Happiness:
This represents the guest's current level of happiness. Guests are happy when they are fed, watered, and entertained.
entityneeds.guest_hunger_ltt:
Hunger Need
This represents the current hunger level of the guest. Guests like to eat different foods from food stands, restaurants, and snack carts.
entityneeds.guest_thirst_ltt:
Thirst Need
This represents the current thirst level of the guest. Guests like to buy drinks from food stands.
entityneeds.guest_rest_ltt:
Rest Need
This represents the current fatigue level of the guest. Guests get tired as they walk around the zoo and like to rest on benches and other seating.
entityneeds.guest_bathroom_ltt:
Bathroom Need
This represents how urgently the guest needs to find a restroom. Guests often need to use the restroom after eating or drinking.
entityneeds.guest_amusement_ltt:
Amusement Need
This represents the current amusement level of the guest. Guests are amused by interesting objects like fountains, arches, and statues.
